      • handleSave

        public boolean handleSave(boolean immediately)
        Menu item callback, changed from Editor.java to automaticaly export and handle the server when it's running. Normal save ops otherwise.
        Overrides:
        handleSave in class Editor
        Parameters:
        immediately - set to false to allow it to be run in a Swing optimized manner
